title: Suryoday Small Finance Bank revises FD interest rates: Check latest FD rates - Economic Times
content: Suryoday Small Finance Bank revises FD interest rates: Check latest FD rates  Economic Times
description: Suryodaya Small Finance Bank has revised its fixed deposit interest rates for various tenors, effective March 10, 2022. Suryoday Small Finance Bank provides FD interest rates ranging from 3.25-7 percent per year with maturities ranging from 7 days to 10 years.
